original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 320.60/321.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 320.60/321.00 to the US dollar on Friday, from 320.70/90 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.02.2026 was quoted at 13.55/60 percent from 13.60/65 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 13.75/85 percent from 13.65/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.03.2028 was quoted at 13.95/14.03 percent from 14.00/14.05 percent.
The Colombo Stock Exchange was trading up in the first hour; the All Share Price Index was up 0.06 percent at 10,466, and the S&P SL20 was up 0.33 percent at 2,966.
Date of announcement of the Monetary Policy Review: No. 01 of 2024 – Tuesday, January 23, 2024 at 7.30 am. (Colombo/Jan19/2024)
